# performWithSender(_:target:)

**Instance Method**

Performs the element’s primary action.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func performWithSender(_ sender: Any?, target: Any?)
```

## Performing actions

- **sender**: The object on behalf of which to perform the menu element’s primary action.
